name: Ghosts in the Brutalist City
description:
I uploaded this a while back, but the download didn't actually work.

Anyway! It's a short horror first person exploration game where you're in a city with brutalist architecture, but something.... just.... isn't right. There's no mystery to solve, no challenge to overcome, it's just an experience to have. Play this game and experience something. That's all I'll say.

Contains jumpscares.
